scripts.build: rm -rf public && npm run build-hugo && npm run clean && npm run build-script && npm run minify-html && npm run build-style
scripts.clean: rm -rf public/css public/js public/page public/post public/notes/page public/notes/index.html public/notes/index.xml
scripts.build-script: mkdir -p public/js && cat src/js/*.js | uglifyjs - > public/js/script.js
scripts.build-style: mkdir -p public/css && npm run build-style-initial && npm run build-style-build
scripts.build-style-build: cat public/css/style.css | ./node_modules/.bin/uncss --htmlroot public public/**/*.html | autoprefixer-cli --no-map | cleancss --s0 --output public/css/style.css
